article_title: Don't Blame Regulation For Capital Spending Drought

article_metadata.description: It's politically astute to blame the current capital spending drought on regulatory uncertainty. A more realistic explanation is the companies are reluctant to expand with more than 20% of their capacity sitting idle.
article_metadata.author: Intelligent Investing

og.description: It's politically astute to blame the current capital spending drought on regulatory uncertainty. A more realistic explanation is the companies are reluctant to expand with more than 20% of their capacity sitting idle.
